Description: Both models identify unauthorized access as a critical threat, emphasizing the need for strong access controls.
Mitigations for data leakage during transmission are common across multiple threat models.
Common attack patterns related to misconfigured firewall rules are identified in both models.
Overlap in compliance requirements related to data protection and access management.
Aggregation of risks related to insecure container images and outdated firmware.

Source: Frequent misconfigurations across various systems leading to unauthorized access and data breaches.
Common gaps in data protection measures, particularly in data in transit and at rest.
